name: The Stopper of Chaos
description:
The Stopper of Chaos is a game made by Stefanarctic in one day(I didn't have time) for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. All the assets were made by me except for the player, which is from the Tiny Forest RPG Pack. Some features weren't finished, will have an update after the voting ends.

The scope of this game is to kill as many enemies as you can and to stop the chaos. (Will also add some story after the voting period). You have 10 fireballs and when you are out of them you need to reload. Will add an use for coins later.

Movement:

Left and Right: D, A or arrow keys
Jump: Space or arrow key up

Shoot fireball: Left Mouse Button

Reload: r

Any feedback is appreciated!
